newsitem.title: USA: Applied Power to buy Everest Electronic for $52 mln.
newsitem.headline: Applied Power to buy Everest Electronic for $52 mln.

text.p: Applied Power Inc., a maker of tools and equipment for various industries, said Wednesday it signed a definitive agreement to acquire Everest Electronic Equipment for $52 million.
Anaheim, Calif.-based Everest makes electronic components used by the computer, telecommunications and data communications industries.
Everest has annual sales of $45 million. It will be integrated with Applied Power's Wright Line segment, Applied said.
